title: 这是王老师，这是我爸爸。
description:
zhè shì wáng lǎoshī zhè shì wǒ bàba
This is teacher Wang, this is my father.

title: 王老师，您好！
description:
wáng lǎoshī nín hǎo
Teacher Wang, hello!

title: 您好！请进！请坐！请喝茶！
description:
nín hǎo qǐng jìn qǐng zuò qǐng hē chá
Hello! Please come in! Have a seat! Have some tea!

title: 谢谢！
description:
xièxie
Thank you!

title: 不客气！
description:
bú kèqi
You're welcome!

title: 工作忙吗？
description:
gōngzuò máng ma
Is your work busy?

title: 不太忙。
description:
bú tài máng
Not too busy.

title: 身体好吗？
description:
shēntǐ hǎo ma
How is your health?

title: 很好！
description:
hěn hǎo
Very good!

title: 请问，你贵姓？
description:
qǐngwèn nǐ guìxìng
Excuse me! What’s your surname?

title: 我姓张。
description:
wǒ xìng zhāng
My surname is Zhang.

title: 你叫什么名字？
description:
nǐ jiào shénme míngzi
What is your full name?

title: 我叫张东。
description:
wǒ jiào zhāng dōng
My full name is Zhang Dong.

title: 你是哪国人？
description:
nǐ shì nǎ guó rén
What nationality are you?

title: 我是中国人，你是哪国人？
description:
wǒ shì zhōngguó rén nǐ shì nǎ guó rén
I’m Chinese, what nationality are you?

title: 我是美国人。
description:
wǒ shì měiguó rén
I'm American.

title: 你学习什么？
description:
nǐ xuéxí shénme
What do you study?

title: 我学习汉语。
description:
wǒ xuěxí hànyǔ
I study Chinese.

title: 汉语难吗？
description:
hànyǔ nán ma
Is Chinese difficult?

title: 汉字很难，发音不太难。
description:
hànzi hěn nán fāyīn bú tài nán
Chinese characters are very difficult, but pronunciation is not too difficult.

title: 这是什么？
description:
zhè shì shénme
What is this?

title: 这是书。
description:
zhè shì shū
This is a book.

title: 这是什么书？
description:
zhè shì shénme shū
What kind of book is this?

title: 这是中文书。
description:
zhè shì zhōngwén shū
This is a Chinese book.

title: 这是谁的书？
description:
zhè shì shéi de shū
Whose book is this?

title: 这是老师的书。
description:
zhè shì lǎoshī de shū
This is the teacher's book.

title: 那是什么？
description:
nà shì shénme
What is that?

title: 那是杂志。
description:
nà shì zázhì
That is a magazine.

title: 那是什么杂志？
description:
nà shì shénme zázhì
What kind of magazine is that?

title: 那是英文杂志。
description:
nà shì yīngwén zázhì
That is an English magazine.

title: 那是谁的杂志？
description:
nà shì shéi de zázhì
Whose magazine is that?

title: 那是我朋友的杂志。
description:
nà shì wǒ péngyou de zázhì
That's my friend's magazine.

title: 你好！
description:
nǐ hǎo
Hello!

title: 你好！
description:
nǐ hǎo
Hello!

title: 你忙吗？
description:
nǐ máng ma
Are you busy?

title: 很忙。
description:
hěn máng
Very busy.

title: 汉语难吗？
description:
hànyǔ nán ma
Is Chinese difficult?

title: 不太难。
description:
bú tài nán
Not too difficult.

title: 你学英语吗？
description:
nǐ xué yīngyǔ ma
Do you study English?

title: 不，学汉语。
description:
bù xué hànyǔ
No, I study Chinese.

title: 去北京吗？
description:
qù běijīng ma
Are you going to Beijing?

title: 对。
description:
duì
Yes.

title: 你去邮局寄信吗？
description:
nǐ qù yóujú jì xìn ma
Are you going to the post office to send a letter?

title: 不去。
description:
bú qù
No

title: 去银行取钱。
description:
qù yínháng qǔ qián
I'm going to the bank to withdraw money.

title: 明天见！
description:
míngtiān jiàn
See you tomorrow!

title: 明天见！
description:
míngtiān jiàn
See you tomorrow!

title: 今天星期几？
description:
jīntiān xīngqī jǐ
What day is it today?

title: 今天星期二。
description:
jīntiān xīngqī èr
Today is Tuesday.

title: 你去哪儿？
description:
nǐ qù nǎr
Where are you going?

title: 我去天安门。
description:
wǒ qù tiān ānmén
I'm going to Tiananmen Square.

title: 你去不去？
description:
nǐ qù bu qù
Are you going too?

title: 不去，我回学校。
description:
bú qù wǒ huí xuéxiào
No, I'm not going, I'm going back to school.

title: 再见！
description:
zàijiàn
Goodbye!

title: 再见！
description:
zàijiàn
Goodbye!

title: 对不起！
description:
duìbuqǐ
I'm sorry!

title: 没关系！
description:
méi guānxi
It's okay!

title: 中午你去哪儿吃饭？
description:
zhōngwǔ nǐ qù nǎr chī fàn
Where are you going for lunch?

title: 我去食堂。
description:
wǒ qù shítáng
I'm going to the cafeteria.

title: 你吃什么？
description:
nǐ chī shénme
What would you like to eat?

title: 我吃馒头。
description:
wǒ chī mántou
I'd like to eat steamed buns.

title: 你要几个？
description:
nǐ yào jǐ ge
How many do you want?

title: 一个。你吃吗？
description:
yí ge nǐ chī ma
One. Would you like to eat?

title: 不吃，我吃米饭。
description:
bù chī wǒ chī mǐfàn
No. I'd like to eat rice.

title: 你喝什么？
description:
nǐ hē shénme
What would you like to drink?

title: 我要一碗鸡蛋汤。
description:
wǒ yào yì wǎn jīdàn tāng
I'd like a bowl of egg soup.

title: 你喝吗？
description:
nǐ hē ma
Would you like to drink?

title: 不喝，我喝啤酒。
description:
bù hē wǒ hē píjiǔ
No, I'd like to drink beer.

title: 这些是什么？
description:
zhèxiē shì shénme
What are these?

title: 这是饺子
description:
zhè shì jiǎozi
These are dumplings.

title: 这是包子
description:
zhè shì bāozi
These are steamed buns.

title: 那是面条。
description:
nà shì miàntiáo
Those are noodles.

title: 你买什么？
description:
nǐ mǎi shénme
What do you buy?

title: 我买水果。
description:
wǒ mǎi shuǐguǒ
I want to buy some fruits.

title: 苹果一斤多少钱？
description:
píngguǒ yì jīn duōshao qián
How much does half a kilogram of apples cost?

title: 三块。
description:
sān kuài
Three yuan.

title: 三块？
description:
sān kuài
Three yuan?

title: 太贵了。
description:
tài guì le
That's too expensive.

title: 两块五吧。
description:
liǎng kuài wǔ ba
How about 2 yuan and 5 mao?

title: 你要几斤？
description:
nǐ yào jǐ jīn
How many kilograms do you want?

title: 我买五斤。
description:
wǒ mǎi wǔ jīn
I'll take 2.5 kilograms.

title: 还要别的吗？
description:
hái yào biéde ma
Do you need anything else?

title: 橘子怎么卖？
description:
júzi zěnme mài
How much are the oranges?

title: 两块。
description:
liǎng kuài
Two yuan.

title: 要两斤。
description:
yào liǎng jīn
I'll take one kilogram.

title: 一共多少钱？
description:
yígòng duōshao qián
How much is it in total?

title: 一共十六块五。
description:
yígòng shíliù kuài wǔ
It's a total of 16 yuan 5 mao.

title: 你给十六块吧。
description:
nǐ gěi shíliù kuài ba
But you give me 16 yuan.

title: 给你钱。
description:
gěi nǐ qián
Here's your money.

title: 这是五十，找¹您三十四块。
description:
zhè shì wǔshí zhǎo nín sānshísì kuài
This is 50 yuan, here's your change of 34 yuan.

title: 下午我去图书馆，你去不去？
description:
xiàwǔ wǒ qù túshūguǎn nǐ qù bú qù
In the afternoon, I'm going to the library, are you going too?

title: 我不去。我要去银行换钱。
description:
wǒ bú qù wǒ yào qù yínháng huàn qián
I'm not going. I need to go to the bank to exchange some money.

title: 小姐，我换钱。
description:
xiǎojie wǒ huàn qián
Miss, I'd like to exchange money.

title: 您换什么钱？
description:
nín huàn shénme qián
What currency would you like to exchange?

title: 我换人民币。
description:
wǒ huàn rénmínbì
I'd like to exchange Chinese yuan.

title: 换多少？
description:
huàn duōshao
How much?

title: 二百美元。
description:
èr bǎi měiyuán
200 dollars.

title: 请等一会儿......
description:
qǐng děng yihuìr
Please wait a moment...

title: 先生，给您钱。
description:
xiānsheng gěi nín qián
Sir, here is your money.

title: 请数数。
description:
qǐng shǔshu
Please count it.

title: 对了。谢谢！
description:
duì le xièxie
It's correct. Thank you!

title: 不客气！
description:
bú kèqi
You're welcome.

title: 请问，这是办公室吗？
description:
qǐng wèn zhè shì bàngōngshì ma
Excuse me, is this the office?

title: 是。你找²谁？
description:
shì nǐ zhǎo shéi
Yes. Who are you looking for?

title: 王老师在吗？
description:
wáng lǎoshī zài ma
Is teacher Wang here?

title: 我是他的学生。
description:
wǒ shì tā de xuésheng
I'm his student.

title: 他不在。他在家呢。
description:
tā búzài tā zàijiā ne
He is not here. He is at home.

title: 他住哪儿？
description:
tā zhù nǎr
Where does he live?

title: 他住十八楼一门，房间号是601。
description:
tā zhù shíbā lóu yī mén fángjiān hào shì liù líng yāo
He lives in Flat 18, door 1, room number is 601.

title: 您知道他的电话号码吗？
description:
nín zhīdào tā de diànhuà hàomǎ ma
Do you know his phone number?

title: 知道，62931074。
description:
zhīdào liù èr jiǔ sān yāo líng qī sì
Yes, I do. 62931074.

title: 他的手机号码是多少？
description:
tā de shǒujī hàomǎ shì duōshao
How about his mobile number?

title: 不知道。
description:
bù zhīdào
I don't know.

title: 谢谢您！
description:
xièxie nín
Thank you!

title: 不客气。
description:
bú kèqi
You're welcome.

title: 我先介绍一下儿。
description:
wǒ xiān jièshào yíxiàr
First let me introduce you.

title: 这位是王教授。
description:
zhè wèi shì wáng jiàoshòu
This is Professor Wang.

title: 这是马校长。
description:
zhè shì mǎ xiàozhǎng
This is Principal Ma.

title: 欢迎您，王教授。
description:
huānyíng nín wáng jiàoshòu
Welcome, Professor Wang.

title: 谢谢！
description:
xièxie
Thank you!

title: 你是留学生吗？
description:
nǐ shì liúxuéshēng ma
Are you an international student?

title: 是。
description:
shì
Yes.

title: 罗兰也是留学生吗？
description:
Luólán yě shì liúxuéshēng ma
Is Roland also an international student?

title: 她也是留学生。
description:
tā yě shì liúxuéshēng
She is also an international student.

title: 我们都是留学生。
description:
wǒmen dōu shì liúxuéshēng
We are both international students.

title: 张东和田芳也都是留学生吗？
description:
Zhāngdōng hé Tiánfāng yě dōu shì liúxuéshēng ma
Are Zhang Dong and Tian Fang also international students?

title: 不，他们俩不是留学生。
description:
bù tāmen liǎ bú shì liúxuéshēng
No, the two of them are not international students.

title: 他们都是中国学生。
description:
tāmen dōu shì zhōngguó xuésheng
They are both Chinese students.

title: 他是中国人吗？
description:
tā shì zhōngguó rén ma
Is he Chinese?

title: 是。
description:
shì
Yes.

title: 你也是中国人吗？
description:
nǐ yě shì zhōngguó rén ma
Are you Chinese too?

title: 不是。我是韩国人。
description:
bú shì wǒ shì hánguó rén
No, I am Korean.

title: 对不起。
description:
duì bu qǐ
Sorry.

title: 没什么。
description:
méi shénme
It's okay.
